contents:
沒錯。是説過。比如這一段：

Wang: The judicial system must move forward under the leadership of the Party. This is a Chinese characteristic. The idea of using Chinese teachings as the spirit and Western teachings as the tool will not work. China has all the basic elements of human culture – how can we expand the best parts? When it comes to the most basic values, we’re the same – otherwise how could we talk to each other? 

我的草譯： “司法系統必須在黨的領導下前進。這是中國特色。中學為躰西學為用的思路行不通。中國有人類文明的所有基本要素——我們如何取其精華？在最基本的價值上，我們是共同的——否則我們怎麽對話？”

王說憲法那一段更狠更流氓。

Wang： The Americans who drew up the constitution were very clever. First they ensured their own benefits… then they brought the poor and gradually women into the Constitution; finally, blacks were brought in. Blacks were given the right to vote 200 years after the nation was founded. However, now America requires other countries to copy them…

我的草譯：“美國草憲者很聰明。首先他們保障了自己的利益……然後才把窮人，逐漸把女性，納入了憲法；最後才加入了黑人。黑人在建國200年后才有投票權。但是，現在美國要求其它國家去抄這些……”

以上來源及全文在《外交官》雜志 2015年5月19日  https://thediplomat.com/2015/05/what-did-chinas-top-graft-buster-have-to-say-to-francis-fukuyama/
